name: limentional
description:
Set in a liminal and surreal environment, you must explore and traverse puzzles to succeed as you become increasingly entrapped in the world and your mind.

At it's most basic limentional is an FPS platforming game with horror elements, and some emphasis on mental health.

Music:

All music featured in this game was produced by the very talented glaciære. Please find their music on Bandcamp:

https://steviasphere.bandcamp.com/album/pool-water-blue

What's next:

The project is in its preliminary/demo phase. So expect more to come. 

As the game is developed I hope to expand the horror experience, but also introduce a multiplayer element as well. There will of course be additional stages and themes as the game progresses. Other additions will include benefits (such as buffs or abilities) for finding the collectibles (MAXIMS).

Please take your time to play the demo and leave feedback. I want to make this as good as possible!

I have set up a Discord channel also, if you'd like to discuss in chat:

https://discord.com/channels/1028011581533081701/1028011583282102335
